about_the_game:
The Tagnoos 898 is a hopper wagon used for transporting bulk materials which are sensitive to moisture, such as grain and animal feed.

The Tagnoos 898 Wagon Pack for TS Marketplace includes two liveries and the RandomSkin system, which add realistic variation to your consists as you place the wagons in scenarios.

Features:


  • Railion and Schenker liveries
  • Automatic back plates and dynamic numbering
  • RandomSkin system which randomly varies wagon ksins as you place them in scenarios

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows® Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor:Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:6 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos[/l]ist]
